title: Visible 2-Dimensional Photonic Crystal Laser
abstract: Visible 2-dimensional photonic crystal lasers were fabricated within membranes of InGaP/InGaAlP quantum well material emitting around 670nm. These red photonic crystal lasers with ultra-small mode volumes (~0.01μm^3) are ideally useful for spectroscopic sources.
